page.title: 20ROUNDUP, ALLET/CALLESTICK.
page.content: This has been an unusually dry, colourful autumn for Cornwall; it has been pleasant to drive in my MINI along country lanes, visiting farms, discovering many aspects of country life. I have learnt a lot & seen many animals including grey squirrels,jays, buzzards,pheasants,bullfinches,magpies & woodpigeons.I am grateful to all the people who have talked willingly about their way of life in 1985. Alan Kirk helped on computer problems, after Jonathan Pettit had struggled in vain with cassettes. John Pickup lent B.B.C. computer and disc drive, for successful recording of data. Michael,18 months old, came with me. Liz,15,Jonathan,13,Joanna,9,tolerated several Domesday-dominated months at home.Barry,G.P.in Truro wrote on Allet and Fairview Farms and Nurseries. Susan Pettit for the Pettit Family.
